desc: Bang & Olufsen’s official Flagship store in New Zealand. RLAV Group. We are located at the corner of Teed and Crowhurst Streets in Newmarket, Auckland. Bang & Olufsen have been in New Zealand for over 25 years and we aim to carry on this fantastic brand for years to come.

layout.text: Create a home filled with music with Connected Speakers. Compatible with all setups, ready to play and tuned to your movement from room to room.
